title: It's official. Biden's signature student loan repayment plan is over.
shortDescription: The Trump administration announced a joint legal settlement that will end Biden's main student debt relief program.

title: Supreme Court may toss campaign finance limit targeted by Trump, GOP
shortDescription: The Republican Party wants the Supreme Court to overturn a 2001 decision aimed at preventing donors from bypassing limits on what they can give candidates.

title: Nancy Mace says GOP leaders marginalize members, including women
shortDescription: Rep. Nancy Mace, R-South Carolina, lays into her party's House leaders in a new opinion article published by the New York Times.

title: How Donald Trump became 'Daddy'
shortDescription: Donald Trump is President of the United States, Commander-in-Chief, Leader of the Free World – and "daddy," according to his own White House.

title: Nancy Mace slams GOP leaders claiming Pelosi was better than Johnson
shortDescription: Republican Rep. Nancy Mace, who is running to become South Carolina's governor, wrote Nancy Pelosi was better than current House Speaker Mike Johnson.

title: Despite Trump's claims, Venezuela isn't a major source of deadly drugs
shortDescription: President Trump says destroying drug boats is saving Americans' lives. But Venezuela is linked to cocaine, which is far less deadly than fentanyl.

title: Trump going to Mount Pocono, PA today. What time is he speaking?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is going to speak at the Mount Airy Casino Resort in Mount Pocono, Pennsylvania. What time is the rally? See Trump's schedule.

title: Will Trump be named Time Person of the Year again? Here are the odds
shortDescription: Time's annual Person of the year edition is nearing. Will President Donald Trump grace the cover again? Or will artificial intelligence take it?

title: Trump says 'fantastic' Supreme Court shouldn't step down
shortDescription: "I hope they stay ’cause I think they’re fantastic, OK? Both of those men are fantastic," Trump said of the two oldest Supreme Court justices.

title: Miami mayor special election candidates
shortDescription: Democrat Eileen Higgins and Republican Emilio González are locked in a tight race for Miami mayor.

title: Trump's approval sees bump in new poll. Here's a big reason why.
shortDescription: In the latest Reuters/Ipsos poll, the president had a small overall approval rating bump, while Republicans' views on one key issue jumped.

title: Honduras issues arrest warrant for ex-president who Trump pardoned
shortDescription: Former president Juan Orlando Hernandez was pardoned by U.S. President Donald Trump and released from prison where he was serving a 45-year term.

title: Trump demands Mexico supply US more water
shortDescription: President Donald Trump demanded Mexico supply the U.S. more water under a 1944 treaty or face 5% higher tariffs.

title: Former president of Honduras freed after Trump pardon in drug-trafficking case
shortDescription: His wife Ana García thanked President Trump for pardoning Hernández via the social platform X early Tuesday.

title: Trump clears Nvidia H200 chip exports to China
shortDescription: Trump allows Nvidia H200 AI chips to be sold to China with a 25% import tax after meeting CEO Jensen Huang.

title: Trump demands more water from Mexico under threat of 5% higher tariffs
shortDescription: Trump demanded Mexico provide more water under a 1944 treaty and threatened to hike tariffs 5% if the country doesn't comply.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump to the battleground
shortDescription: A presidential Pennsylvania visit underscores midterm motivations. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Trump, GOP face test in Miami mayor runoff: Meet the candidates
shortDescription: The fight to fill Miami’s mayoral office comes to a head on Tuesday evening during a special runoff election that has high stakes for national politics

title: Trump's economy is under fire. Can he sell it in Pennsylvania trip?
shortDescription: Trump's speech Dec. 9 at the Mount Airy Casino Resort in Mount Pocono comes as Republicans struggle with their response to affordability concerns.
